ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Our major achievements are in Education by creating schools. We work for languages, consultancy services, tourism national public services, Job solution and travel agency, Soch bharat abiyaan, child care and women empowerment, sufism and holy shrines, survey, physical education and sports, tribal areas

sourceOfFunds.purpose: We are spending the funds on the education sector whatever we are getting through the donation. Since we are running two schools under JKBOSE up to the primary standard, which will be upgraded to middle level in 2019. We are providing free education to the orphan, S.T, Physically challenged and poor students. For the general category students, we have framed a less fee structure which is compensated for the other expenses of the schools and the organization.

We use any amount either in the form of gifts or donation in the education sector where we educate the poor, orphan, S.T and physically challenged students. No grants have been received till this time from any government or nongovernment agencies. Society is working just using our own resources. We are committed to ensuring the best services in education, languages, art, and culture, consultancy services, tourism national public services, Job solution and travel agency, Social Bharat abiyaan etc

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Jammu and Kashmir Women Society is a Non -Political, Non -Commercial, Social and Charitable Organisation working for the welfare of needy women & children since 1991 though Regd. during march/95. ACTIVITIES Income Generating programmes The organisation organised income generating & vocational development training programmes in the field of Fabrication of Readymade garments, Machine Embroidery, Kashmiri Embroidery , patch work, Block printing, making of Soap, School FVTBags, Bamboo Craft, Jam, Pickle , Papper , baddi making and hand made sawinya . Seminars/ Workshops & Awareness programes .The organisation organised state level seminars/Work shops on impact of land mine on .//.women, Voilence against women, Women Empowerment , Crime against women, workshop ....on communal harmony and awareness camps on General.Awareness, legal Awareness, ....Rights.of girl child,.Aids.Awareness, Civil Defence training .for.women, Adolescent Girls ....Training, Signature campaign on save the girl child. Health programmes Eye check up/ Operation camps, Health check up, Anemia check up and Pulse Polio camps, ........Health.and Nutirition and Total child health care programme. Education programmes Organisation conducted literacy and skill development training programmes for .women, Street ......children programmes , Pre-schooling centres, Non- formal education,.Free tution centres for ......children and Creches programme. ACHIEVEMENTS Organisation is having TOLLFREE help line number 1800119191. Needy women can approach ......the.organisation for help at any time. Distuributed ration and blankets to flood effected families in relief camps. Provided education assistance to girl students for higher education i.e.B.C.A, M.C.A,M.B.A , B.ED. Etc. The girls have now completed their education. A number of women who were imparted income generating and skill development training are .....earning their livelihood. A number of Women approched Family Counselling Centre run by the organisation to solve their ....family disputes. Most of these cases were settled through counselling. A few most deserving cases who approached the Family Counselling Centre run by organization ....were brought in to kind notice of Hon. Governor J&K. Hon. Governor was kind enough to ....Sanction Financial Assistance of Rs 50000/-. ....Indian Army conducted State Level Seminar on Women Empowerment in colobration with our ....organization. AWARDS The organization received distt. Award from Nehru Yuva Kendra. A member of organization who is a village worker recieved award for her outstanding work from Nehru Yuva Kendra.

ngoList.address: JAN SHIKSHAN SANSTHAN ANHAD EXCHANGE ROAD NEAR DSP OFFICE BRANWARI KUPWARA KASHMIR
ngoList.title: JAN SHIKSHAN SANSTHAN ANHAD KUPWARA KASHMIR
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Special achievements A brief note on special achievements of Jan Shikshan Sansthan Kupwara highlighting the qualitative aspects including impact of the programmes on the beneficiaries, innovative programmes undertaken and special activities conducted etc. Removal of illiteracy and importing the knowledge of 3Rs to all the illiterate people in the age group of 15-35 in our country is the main target of National Literacy Mission. Realizing this need and growing urbanization in the coming decades, the ministry of education had started a scheme of Shramik Vidya Peeths (SVPs), a program of adult education for workers in urban and industrial areas. The scheme showed tremendous achievement in covering illiterates/ neo literates under the banner of skill and knowledge development. To facilitate playing a better role the scheme of Shramik Vidya Peeths was renamed as Jan Shikshan Sansthan (JSS), institute of peoples education with enhanced financial support. Jan Shikshan Sansthan (JSS), Kupwara is conceived as an institute for conducting skill up-gradation in the areas of programs of non-formal adult and continuing education. It would also provide academic and technical resource support to Zila Saksharta Samittee (ZSS) in both urban and rural areas. JSS Kupwara has trained at least 15000 beneficiaries from the entire district since 2007 @ 2000 beneficiaries every year. Moreover with the help of JSS, Kupwara 45 beneficiaries got employment, 150 under self employment, 250 under wage employment, 25 beneficiaries got loan from bank for establishment of their own units after completion of JSSs training. The main objectives of Jan Shikshan Sansthan Kupwara are to improve the occupational skills and technical knowledge of the neo-literates. To provide academic and technical support to Zila Saksharta Samittee (ZSS) in taking of vocational and skill development programmes for neo-literates. To serve as nodal continuing education centers and training orientation centers for key resource persons. The last but not the least objective of the Jan Shikshan Sansthan is to promote national goals, womens equality, protection and conservation of environment. In J&K at Kupwara district JSS was launched in November 2007, sanctioned by Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD) Govt. of India keeping in view the financial and the educational backwardness of the district. At present the main centre of Jan Shikshan Sansthan (JSS) located at Branwari opposite DSPs office exchange road Kupwara is running courses related to different trades such as , Automobile Technician, Electrical Technician, Dress Making., Hand/Machine Embroider, Fashion Designing, Basic Food Preservation, Furniture Making, Plumbing & Sanitary, Photography & Videography, Banner & Sign Board Designing, Hand/Machine Knitting etc. In relation to which, 11 extension centers in Kupwara block, 37 extension centers in Karnah block and 10 extension centers at Handwara block provide skill development and knowledge of 3Rs.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Provided high quality Education to all the sections of the society in general and poor and down trodden of the society in particular. Educated left out cases through adult education literacy mission and awareness programs. The programs run by this NGO are literacy campaign, environment awareness, adult education, computer program and literacy eradiation etc. Also provided free coaching to SC, OBC, ST and minorities to enable them to appear in competitive examination to succeed in obtaining a appropriate job in public/private sector. In the field of Agriculture organized many meeting convention of the farmers with the help of experts to aware them about the new methods of agriculture system. The NGO also organized many programs such as debates and seminars etc for the development of women and children In order to promote Art and Culture, Camps and Work shops organized with the help of experts in the field handicrafts. Programs organized with regard Art and Culture for dying Folk Art form for there revival and promotion also. Medicals camps, Pulse Polio, Campaign talks and seminars organized with the help of eminent doctors and health workers. More program are being organized by this NGO in this regard.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The-Sara is J&K based registered non-profit organization working towards society in which fewer individuals die by suicide. Mission: 1.Crisis Support - services that provide immediate support to individuals at times of difficulty in their lives, and support for communities in the recovery of major events. 2.Suicide Prevention - services that educate individuals and communities about suicide and offer appropriate support for those people who are at risk of suicide or bereaved by suicide. 3.Mental Health Support - services that provide support for people experiencing mental illness and which offer reliable information and self help resources to empower people to take steps towards maintaining health and emotional well being.

OFFICES OF THE Tribal Research and Cultural Foundation It is provided in the Constitution of the Tribal Research and Cultural Foundation that its headquarters shall be at Poonch but it may be partially work in tribal Belts of India. ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The aim of the society is to help and provide care to the underprivileged children at present there are more than 600 children who are getting education and day meal in center and associated schools Till date more than 13000 underprivileged children have been benefited under the purview of the society for the last two and half decades Our main aim is to give such children an opportunity for participation in the educational system of the country With out 27 years experience of work in the slums of Jammu city we will be able to divert children from begging and child labour to formal education through non formal educational bridge education We provide vocational trainings and counselling of the parents of the children Working without any assistance from any Government we are proud of some of the children who have been diverted from beggary child labour and balloon sellers to get formal education in the mainstream of education system of the country

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Our society VOICE is working for the upliftment of the weaker section of the society particulars for the youth , Women, Children by way of organizing awareness camps in the field of Education, Environment, Health, HIV-AIDS, Self Employment Generation, Formation of Self Help Groups , Legal Literacy & by organizing Skill Dev/ Vocational Trainings for them for their socio economics Upliftment. In this connection our society had organized the following programs Free Eye & Health Camps, 3 Day Multiactivities Awareness Camps , Youth Leadership Training camps , Formation of SHG Camps, Environment Awareness Camps , Camps/ Workshops on HIV/AIDS & Health Life Style Plantation, Cleanliness Drive , Blood Donation Camps, PIL & writ petition filed by our organization for seeking justice , Organised press conferences on the subject youth , women & children. This socio economic , educational, emotional & judicial empowerment., Distribution of cloths, Stationary & food among the orphans & militancy affected childrens / women of the Gool, Mahore, Doda etc. Our organized had also organized various health baby show programs, different competitions on the subject National Integration , Healthy Life Style, Environment , socio economic, educational , empowerment of the Urban Youth & children. Now our main focus is on formation of SHGs & to impart Vocational Trainings for the Rural & Poor womens for their socio economic development & to aware & educate the children / Youth about different social problems

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: 1. our organisation is affiliated to the worlds largest university i,e INDIRA GANDHI NATIONAL OPEN UNIVERSITY maiden new- Delhi and is running a special study centre vide their no SSC-1228-D Magam Budgam, by virtue of whcih our organisation is serving education to thousands of students in completing their degrees such as B.A , b.com , bca, ma , mcom , mttm , mpa, mah, meg, mps, mec, mard, mso etc. which we are running since 2000 till date. During the year 2015-16 about 800 students sought admission through our study centre which is being run by our organsation and 1250 studnts have sought admiussion in these courses run by our society. 2. our organisation is alos running one year Diploma in urdu Language (NCPUL) Ministry of Human Resources Development Govt. of India. and during the year 2015-16 and 95 students got themselvces admitted to achieve this One Year Diploma in Urdu language. 3.Our organisation is also certified by Khadi and Village industries commission Mumbai, Govt. of India (KVIV) to implement Khadi and Village Programmes to provide work and wages to hundreds of Khadi Artisans Khadi weavers and spinners under the fold of Gandhi-an khadi programmes. 4. Our organisation conduts several awareness camps of foeticide, female sec ratio diminishing, awareness on National interated, communal harmony, child - Labour,Dowery etc . in order to create awareness amongst the masses with special focus on women. 5.our organistaion has provided computer education to so many boys and girls on a nominal fee to facilitate them to get computer education easily. 6. our organisation has made a base-line survey on the gross route level in District Baramulla and identified 1000 artisans in different Arts & crafts in handicratfs sector, and formulated a big project under the AHVY- Baba Ambedkar Hastshilip yojna and was submitted to Development Commissioner (Handicrafts) Ministry of Texttiles, Govt of India, New Delhi, Which has been Sanctioned by DCH-New Delhi Vide Their letter no : C-12011/24/2013-14-CC(NR)-1/17531 Dated 24.06.2014. The project is for period of 05 yrs duration, which our organisation has started and shall complete in record time depending upon the avaiolability of funds to be relesed by the sponsoring deparments. 7. our organisation got registered itself with national institute of Electronics and information techonology, govt of India vide their reg. No 88001513/NIELIT dated 08.11.2013 as facilitaion Centre to Conducting traning and fielding candidates for CCC and BCC on self certification basis. Our organisation is a social Organisation and has a dream of serving people for which we have a mission and here are so many tasks before our oranisation which we want to fulfil for which our organisation sall approach to so many agencies, organisations, state and central govt. for financial assistance for implementaion of these programmes.
